item.title: Always
item.description: [[songs/d/dead_astronauts/arms_of_night/no_voice_remains.md#devoid-of-sound-vyl-wnanory|When the world gets too heavy]] [[songs/d/dead_astronauts/arms_of_night/no_voice_remains.md#devoid-of-sound-vyl-wnanory|Put it on my back]] [[songs/d/dead_astronauts/arms_of_night/no_voice_remains.md#devoid-of-sound-vyl-wnanory|I’ll be your levy]] [[songs/d/dead_astronauts/arms_of_night/no_voice_remains.md#devoid-of-sound-vyl-wnanory|You are taking me apart]] [[songs/d/dead_astronauts/arms_of_night/no_voice_remains.

item.title: Hurricane
item.description: [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/unraveled.md#are-you-too-full-of-fear-for-me-now-vyl-wnanory|Are you worth your weight in gold?]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/unraveled.md#are-you-too-full-of-fear-for-me-now-vyl-wnanory|‘Cause you’re behind my eyelids when I’m all alone]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/unraveled.md#are-you-too-full-of-fear-for-me-now-vyl-wnanory|Hey stranger, I want ya to catch me like a cold]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/unraveled.

item.title: Let’s Kill Tonight
item.description: [[songs/e/eluveitie/everything_remains_as_it_never_was/quoth_the_raven.md#i-haunt-your-fears-vyl-wnanory|If I retreat]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/everything_remains_as_it_never_was/quoth_the_raven.md#i-haunt-your-fears-vyl-wnanory|Words, wars, and symphonies]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/everything_remains_as_it_never_was/quoth_the_raven.md#i-haunt-your-fears-vyl-wnanory|Make room we’re taking over here]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/everything_remains_as_it_never_was/quoth_the_raven.md#i-haunt-your-fears-vyl-wnanory|And you’re the galentine]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/everything_remains_as_it_never_was/quoth_the_raven.md#i-haunt-your-fears-vyl-wnanory|Cold and alone, it suits you well]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/everything_remains_as_it_never_was/quoth_the_raven.

item.title: Memories
item.description: [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/perception/hero.md#it-is-the-darkest-night-stars-invisible-vyl-wnanory|He was the congregation’s vagrant]] [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/perception/hero.md#it-is-the-darkest-night-stars-invisible-vyl-wnanory|With an unrequited love]] [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/perception/hero.md#it-is-the-darkest-night-stars-invisible-vyl-wnanory|When your passion’s exaltation]] [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/perception/hero.md#it-is-the-darkest-night-stars-invisible-vyl-wnanory|Then finding refuge is not enough]] [[songs/s/system_of_a_down/steal_this_album/streamline.

item.title: Sarah Smiles
item.description: [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/avenged_sevenfold/afterlife.md#place-of-hope-and-no-pain-perfect-skies-with-no-rain-vyl-wnanory|I was fine, just a guy living on my own]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/avenged_sevenfold/afterlife.md#place-of-hope-and-no-pain-perfect-skies-with-no-rain-vyl-wnanory|Waiting for the sky to fall]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/avenged_sevenfold/afterlife.md#place-of-hope-and-no-pain-perfect-skies-with-no-rain-vyl-wnanory|Then you called and changed it all, Doll]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/avenged_sevenfold/afterlife.

item.title: The Ballad Of Mona Lisa
item.description: [[songs/e/ed_sheeran/x/one.md#take-my-hand-and-my-vyl-wnanory|She paints her fingers with a close precision]] [[songs/e/ed_sheeran/x/one.md#take-my-hand-and-my-vyl-wnanory|He starts to notice empty bottles of gin]] [[songs/e/ed_sheeran/x/one.md#take-my-hand-and-my-vyl-wnanory|And takes a moment to assess the sin, she’s paid for]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/the_castle_builders.

item.title: The Calendar
item.description: [[songs/s/stick_to_your_guns/diamond/ring_loud_last_hope.md#my-friend-what-has-you-so-troubled-vyl-wnanory|(But only for you)]] [[songs/s/stick_to_your_guns/diamond/ring_loud_last_hope.md#my-friend-what-has-you-so-troubled-vyl-wnanory|(Only for you)]] [[songs/d/damageplan/new_found_power/new_found_power.md#nothing-ventured-nothing-gained-vyl-wnanory|They said “If you don’t let it out]] [[songs/d/damageplan/new_found_power/new_found_power.md#nothing-ventured-nothing-gained-vyl-wnanory|You’re gonna let it eat you away.

item.title: Trade Mistakes
item.description: [[songs/o/of_mice__men/the_flood/when_you_cant_sleep_at_night.md#here-in-this-world-im-awaked-with-mistakes-vyl-wnanory|Place in a smile at the perfect event,]] [[songs/o/of_mice__men/the_flood/when_you_cant_sleep_at_night.md#here-in-this-world-im-awaked-with-mistakes-vyl-wnanory|Gracing your skin with the side of my hand.]] [[songs/o/of_mice__men/the_flood/when_you_cant_sleep_at_night.md#here-in-this-world-im-awaked-with-mistakes-vyl-wnanory|If I ever leave I could learn to miss you]] [[songs/o/of_mice__men/the_flood/when_you_cant_sleep_at_night.
